data.title: Jorja Fox Married, partner, Quick Facts, is she a lesbian?
data.meta_description: Jorja Fox is an American producer and actress who is respected for her acting skills and flawless roles in the production industry. As an actress, she has
data.text:
Jorja Fox is an American producer and actress who is respected for her acting skills and flawless roles in the production industry.

As an actress, she has appeared in over 30 movies and TV shows, but is best known for her role as Dr. Maggie Doyle on ER, a medical series that ran from 1996 to 1999.

She also has another hit drama series under her name titled: The West Wing. Produced in 2010 , Fox played Secret Service agent Gina Toscano in the political drama series.

No doubt, most people only know the actress from the screen. But you will know more about his life, his age; if she is married and who is her partner. We will also present to you the answer to the controversial question of whether she is a lesbian or not.

Jorja Fox Bio – Age

Actress Jorja-An Fox is the daughter of Edward Fox and Marilyn Fox, two Montreal-born couples of French, Belgian and Irish descent. She was born on July 7, 1968 in New York, United States.

Edward and Marilyn are also the parents of Jeff Fox, Jorja’s older brother, born in 1957. The actress was raised in Melbourne Beach, Florida, where she also attended Melbourne High School for two years. . She studied drama craft under the famous actor William Hickey at the Lee Strasberg Institute in New York.

Fox was first discovered at a local mall by an agent. She launched her modeling career after winning the crown at a local modeling contest.

Is she married, who is her partner?

Well, the Fox actress is single and could probably get married one day. Throughout her life, she is known to have dated a man. His name is Gary Dourdan. The pair dated from 2001 to 2002.

Gary is an American actor born on December 11, 1966 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. He rose to fame through his role as Warrick Brown in CSI: Crime Scene Investigation.

Apart from the information provided above, there are no more rumors or reports about Jorja Fox’s boyfriend, marital life and children.

Is Jorja Fox a lesbian?

Having come a long way in her career, Jorja has an interesting story about her life and how she made the most of it. An interesting aspect of her life is the fact that she loves and prefers women to the company of the opposite sex.

A proud lesbian, the model has been in at least three known relationships. His last known relationship was with Lelah Foster, a popular actress known for her roles in The Ten Rules (2002), CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (2000) and Selena (1997).

The pair started dating in 2014 but decided to call it quits after a few years. Before her relationship with Lelah, Jorja had a date with actress Sami Reed, her lover, she would have cheated on her with Lelah. Reed was forced to leave Fox’s foster home after discovering that Fox had cheated on her.

Fox also met American actress Suzanne Mara, who would be her first known partner. The movie stars started a relationship in 2002, but broke up after some time.

At the moment, Fox is single and is probably looking for another partner to spend some quality time with.

Quick facts about the actress

1. The name of the actress “Jorja” is pronounced “Georgia”.

2. She was chubby as a child. On top of that, she had a large gap between her teeth. Growing up, she thought the gap would narrow as he grew, but much to her disappointment, that wasn’t the case. The actress said she decided not to worry about her teeth when she was 20.

3. Fox has a beautiful dog called Bexar. She adopted the dog from a street in Bexar County, Texas.

4. In 2003, she was ranked the 80th hottest woman in Stuff’s publication titled “103 Sexiest Women.”

5. Besides acting, Jorja enjoys singing, playing guitar and traveling.

6. She is carrying a beautiful handbag named by Matt & Nat, a Montreal brand specializing in vegan products. (www.mattandnat.com).

7. Fox has been a devoted vegetarian since she was 19. Her love for the vegan diet led her to collaborate with the American animal rights organization, People for Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA), to advance vegetarianism.

8. She has an estimated net worth of $6 million.

9. His sun sign is cancer.
